sentences.english: Publication of academic works on more than 10 articles and two monographs.
sentences.chinese: 發表學術論著10餘篇和參編專著2本。

sentences.english: The results will be reported in scientific journals in the near future" , said Dr Vallotton."
sentences.chinese: 不久的將來，其結果將會發表在學術刊物上。

sentences.english: The Industrial cluster is a topic popularily concerned in the academic world either in our country or abroad in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 產業集羣是近年來國內外學術界關注的一個熱點話題。

sentences.english: The textology of the Qing Dynasty is an old subject in the academic circle.
sentences.chinese: 清代考據學是學術界多次探討的老問題。

sentences.english: Greeting with Iranian, you need to address their surname with their academic or job title.
sentences.chinese: 和伊朗人打招呼，要稱他們的姓加上學術或職務頭銜。

sentences.english: However, in recent years, uncertain multi-attribute decision making attracts more and more attention.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，不確定多屬性決策引起了學術界的廣泛關注。

sentences.english: But theorists hold different viewpoints on the origin of historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 但學術界在唯物史觀誕生標誌問題上，一直都有分歧。

sentences.english: Cultural Studies provides an indispensable background for the reflection on literary theory as a discipline.
sentences.chinese: 文化研究是文藝學學科反思的重要學術背景。

sentences.english: To elucidate the academic thought of Professor ZHOU Zhong-ying about cancerous toxin.
sentences.chinese: 闡述周仲瑛教授的“癌毒”學術思想。

sentences.english: The academic background influences very little on the knowledge required to be a PM.
sentences.chinese: 學術背景對成爲一個項目經理所需的知識影響甚微。

sentences.english: Academic contends on the founding of Periodical Science is a rather fierce topic in the periodicals-related circle in China.
sentences.chinese: 期刊學是我國期刊界學術爭鳴比較激烈的研究領域。

sentences.english: The degree provides the academic and practical experience to practise as a radiographer.
sentences.chinese: 該學位提供技師的學術及實務執業經驗。

sentences.english: Editors of academic journal should become scholar-style editor and reach high spiritual confine.
sentences.chinese: 辦學術期刊對於辦刊人的精神境界要求很高。

sentences.english: His dictionaries, too, were wide ranging in their intended audiences and level of scholarliness.
sentences.chinese: 他的字典在其特定的讀者和學術界之中廣泛流傳。

sentences.english: A: With my strong academic background, I am capable and competent.
sentences.chinese: 依我的良好學術背景，我是勝任愉快的。

sentences.english: The legitimacy of women's studies as a discipline has for long been challenged by academic circles.
sentences.chinese: 婦女學的學科合法性長期受到學術界的質疑。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
